ai-tha-ap212:1.1_0: “So it’s good to misrepresent the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap212:1.2_0: to such a one, freed through enlightenment,
ai-tha-ap212:1.3_0: if I’ve given to someone who is when it’s given,
ai-tha-ap212:1.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap212:2.2_0: may be skilled in what is appropriate and excellent,
ai-tha-ap212:2.4_0: There is fruit of past deeds.
ai-tha-ap212:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap212:3.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap212:4.2_0: fine and coarse, beautiful and ugly:
ai-tha-ap212:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap212:5.1_0: At seven eons of the cosmos contracted
ai-tha-ap212:5.3_0: And it’s the source of a great man
ai-tha-ap212:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap212:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable senior venerable junior.
ai-tha-ap212:8.1_0: for the senior monk, the tenth section.
ai-tha-ap212:9.1_0: The group of twenty on one side is finished.
